quests.desc: You are now playing a fast paced session of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, make an effort to head north. With that done, make an effort to venture north. That done, travel west. Next, attempt to venture west. After that, attempt to head south. Then, go south. Then, make an effort to take a trip west. And then, retrieve the spherical passkey from the table. If you can get your hands on the spherical passkey, check that the spherical box is unlocked with the spherical passkey. After that, open the spherical box. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
commands: unlock spherical box with spherical passkey
unlock spherical box with spherical passkey

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a restroom.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a spherical box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The spherical box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The spherical box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a canteen. A typical one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. A standard one.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Huh, weird.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cabinet is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Ah, the playroom. This is some kind of playroom, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.

 You see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: steam room

Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a steam room.

What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a dresser.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. A normal one.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a drawer.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a trunk.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see a trunk in a room.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. You move on, clearly upset with TextWorld.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

walkthrough: unlock spherical box with spherical passkey

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an effort to head north. And then, make an effort to venture north. And then, try to head west. After that, venture west. Then, attempt to travel south. After that, go to the south. With that over with, try to take a trip west. And then, take the spherical passkey from the table inside the restroom. And then, unlock the spherical box. If you have unlocked the spherical box, ensure that the spherical box within the restroom is open. Alright, thanks!
